subject: Maven project file for JUnit as OSGi bundle
msgSnippet: We have been working hard to provide the OSGi headers in JUnit. You can find the pull request with integration tests in GitHub:
messageBody:
We have been working hard to provide the OSGi headers in JUnit.
You can find the pull request with integration tests in GitHub:
https://github.com/junit-team/junit/pull/472
and other #701 without integration tests.
I want to get more people who is willing to vote for OSGi in JUnit +1.
So if you like the OSGi, please go to GitHub put "+1" or do it right in this email.
